channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: The Keychron Q3 HE 8K sets itself apart thanks to groundbreaking 8K polling rate and Ultra-Fast Lime Magnetic switches that use Tunneling Magnetoresis...

item.title: The CEO behind the world’s top sleep and meditation app says most leaders are operating at ‘about 20%’ without a ‘fully recharged’ battery
item.description: David Ko said most executives will say they’re good when you ask how they are. Some additional interrogation suggests the opposite is true.

item.title: The new American Dream has parents easing up on college expectations for their kids—1 in 3 are now open to trade school instead
item.description: “Parents are waking up,” career strategist says. “College doesn’t carry the same [return on investment] it once did.”

item.title: BBDO International CEO: The biggest risks are the ones not taken
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Meta’s 28-year-old billionaire prodigy says the next Bill Gates will be a 13-year-old who is ‘vibe coding’ right now
item.description: Teenagers, Alexandr Wang argues, have a built-in edge.

item.title: Israel’s IDF Bans Android Phones—Do You Need To Buy An iPhone?
item.description: IDF says Android is not secure — iPhone now becomes mandatory. Here's what that means for Android users everywhere else.

item.title: ‘It’s Scary’—FBI Warns Smartphone Users: Do Not Take These Calls
item.description: Hang up immediately. This is an attack.

item.title: Sneaking unemployment rate means the U.S. economy is inching closer to a key recession indicator, says Moody’s
item.description: "The trends are not our friends here," said Moody's economist Cris deRitis.

item.title: Samsung SmartThings Adds Security Cameras To Its Matter Mix
item.description: Matter 1.5 added smart security cameras to the spec and SmartThings will support those devices.

item.title: Mortgage rates slip, sticking near 2025 lows

item.title: Musk predicts AI will create 'universal high income' and make saving money unnecessary
item.description: Elon Musk dismisses Trump savings accounts, claiming AI will create "universal high income" and eliminate poverty, making saving unnecessary.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
